Johan Budi: Banyak Pasal Multitafsir dalam Revisi PKPU
05 Nov 2019, 17:08 by Marga Rahayu


Johan Budi: Banyak Pasal Multitafsir dalam Revisi PKPU

KBRN, Jakarta : Anggota Komisi II DPR RI dari Fraksi PDI Perjuangan Johan Budi mengkritisi sejumlah pasal dalam revisi Peraturan KPU atau PKPU Nomor 3 Tahun 2017 mengenai Pemilihan Kepala Daerah yang dinilainya multitafsir.
Dalam perbincangan bersama RRI, Selasa (5/11/2019), Johan Budi menyebutkan PKPU yang kini memasuki tahapan revisi menyongsong Pesta Demokrasi serentak 2020 seharusnya tidak bertentangan dengan Undang-undang Pemilu diatasnya serta memiliki penjelasan kongkrit dan terperinci sehingga tidak memicu perdebatan ditataran pelaksana.
Mantan Juru Bicara Presiden tersebut mencontohkan pasal mengenai persyaratan menjadi Gubernur dan Wakil Gubernur serta Bupati/Walikota banyak yang tidak jelas salah satunya terkait definisi mantan terpidana karena alasan politik dilarang mencalonkan diri sebagai Kepala Daerah.
“Saya sendiri mengkritisi PKPU tidak boleh multitafsir karena namanya juga peraturan pelaksana UU 10 Tahun 2016. Ada beberapa catatan, misalnya terpidana yang tidak menjalani pidana dalam penjara ini menurut saya tidak clear. Kemudian terpidana karena alasan politik itu juga siapa yang bisa mendefinisikan?  Harus diperjelas supaya pelaksana dibawah tidak kesulitan melaksanakan itu”, ungkap Johan.
Sebelumnya dalam Rapat Dengar Pendapat atau RDP Komisi II DPR RI bersama Penyelenggara Pemilu Senin (4/11/2019) siang, KPU mendapat banyak kritikan, masukan dan pertanyaan terkait poin-poin dalam revisi PKPU Nomor 3/2017. Rapat Dengar Pendapat kembali digelar dengan agenda mendengarkan jawaban Komisi Pemilihan Umum pada Senin 11 November mendatang.

Johan Budi: Many Articles of Interpretation in PKPU Revision
05 Nov 2019, 17:08 by Marga Rahayu


Johan Budi: Many Articles of Interpretation in PKPU Revision

KBRN, Jakarta: Member of Commission II of the Republic of Indonesia DPR from the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle Faction Johan Budi criticized a number of articles in the revision of KPU or PKPU Regulation No. 3 of 2017 concerning the Election of Regional Heads which are considered multiple interpretations.
In a discussion with RRI, Tuesday (11/5/2019), Johan Budi said PKPU, which is now entering the revision stage to meet the 2020 Democratic Party, should not be in conflict with the Election Law above and has concrete and detailed explanations so as not to trigger debate in the level of the executive.
The former Presidential Spokesman exemplifies the article regarding the requirements to become Governor and Deputy Governor and Regent / Mayor, many of which are unclear, one of which is related to the definition of a former convict for political reasons, is prohibited from running for Regional Head.
"I myself criticize PKPU not to be interpreted because its name is also implementing regulations for Act 10 of 2016. There are some notes, for example, a convict who did not undergo a crime in prison in my opinion is not clear. Then convicted for political reasons is also who can define? It must be clarified so that the implementers below have no difficulty implementing it, "Johan said.
Earlier in the Hearing Meeting or RDP Commission II of the Republic of Indonesia House of Representatives together with the Election Organizer Monday (4/11/2019) afternoon, the KPU received a lot of criticism, input and questions related to points in the revision of PKPU Number 3/2017. The hearing was held again with the agenda of listening to the General Elections Commission's answer on Monday 11 November.
